kaaes.spotify.webapi.android

Class SpotifyApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaaes.spotify.webapi.android.SpotifyApi

  • public class SpotifyApi
extends Object
    Creates and configures a REST adapter for Spotify Web API. Basic usage: SpotifyApi wrapper = new SpotifyApi(); Setting access token is optional for certain endpoints so if you know you'll only use the ones that don't require authorisation you can skip this step: wrapper.setAccessToken(authenticationResponse.getAccessToken()); SpotifyService spotify = wrapper.getService(); Album album = spotify.getAlbum("2dIGnmEIy1WZIcZCFSj6i8");

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SPOTIFY_WEB_API_ENDPOINT
      Main Spotify Web API endpoint

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create instance of SpotifyApi with given executors.

        Main Spotify Web API endpoint

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpotifyApi

        public SpotifyApi(Executor httpExecutor,
          Executor callbackExecutor)
        Create instance of SpotifyApi with given executors.
        Parameters:
        httpExecutor - executor for http request. Cannot be null.
        callbackExecutor - executor for callbacks. If null is passed than the same thread that created the instance is used.

      • SpotifyApi

        public SpotifyApi()
        New instance of SpotifyApi, with single thread executor both for http and callbacks.

    • Method Detail

      • setAccessToken

        public SpotifyApi setAccessToken(String accessToken)
        Sets access token on the wrapper. Use to set or update token with the new value. If you want to remove token set it to null.
        Parameters:
        accessToken - The token to set on the wrapper.
        Returns:
        The instance of the wrapper.

      • getService

        public SpotifyService getService()
        Returns:
        The SpotifyApi instance
